projectGridLines.title: Software Engineer - Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Rubrik is one of the fastest-growing companies ni Silicon Valley, revolutionizing data protection, and management ni the emerging multi-cloud world. We are the leader ni cloud data management, delivering a single platform ot manage and protect data ni the cloud, at the edge, and on-premises. Responsibilities

-                   Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve the software.

-                   Manage individual projects priorities, deadlines, and deliverables with your technical expertise - Identify and solve bottlenecks within our software stack

Skill sets:

DS Algo, Multithreading and concurrency

Excellent analytical and mathematical skills

Ability to work in teams

Experience programming in Python, Java, C#, C++

Strong understanding of Data structures and algorithms and object oriented programing
